parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Tread Separation and Disintegration of Firestone Wilderness AT Tires
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The tread separation and disintegration of Firestone Wilderness AT tires can lead to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The tread separates from the rim

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Curing Defect in Firestone Wilderness AT Tires
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The curing defect in Firestone Wilderness AT tires can cause tread separation and disintegration, leading to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Similar to tread separation and disintegration

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Failure to Properly Address Tire Recalls
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure to properly address tire recalls can lead to continued use of defective tires, increasing the risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: but complainants express concerns about the safety of their vehicles and the potential risks associated with defective tires.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Unintended Acceleration due to Cruise Control Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the cruise control system to disengage can cause unintended acceleration, leading to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: the cruise control system does not disengage when the brakes are applied
the accelerator pedal sticks to the floor
the vehicle surges forward without input from the driver.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A stuck accelerator pedal can cause unintended acceleration, leading to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The accelerator pedal sticks to the floor
the vehicle surges forward without input from the driver

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the proportioning valve can cause the rear brakes to fail, leading to the front tires locking up and skidding, which can result in accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: the rear brakes fail to engage
the front tires lock up and skid.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear brake shoes or drums can cause the brakes to lock up, leading to loss of control and potential accidents.
The failure of the right front rotor bolts can cause damage to the rotor, leading to reduced braking performance and potential accidents.
symptoms: the brakes may vibrate or pulsate.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the ABS system can cause the brakes to malfunction, leading to loss of control and potential accidents.
symptoms: The ABS system does not work properly
the brakes may lock up or vibrate.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Intermittent Speedometer Failure in Cold Weather
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent failure of the speedometer can cause the driver to lose awareness of their speed, potentially leading to accidents or traffic violations.
symptoms: the speedometer does not display the correct speed
the speedometer is inoperable in cold weather.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of transmission gears can cause the vehicle to stall, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
The failure of the 4-wheel drive locking hubs can cause loss of traction, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The front left/right 4-wheel drive locking hubs fail
excessive wear on the plastic material

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the differential can cause the 4-wheel drive system to malfunction, leading to loss of traction and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: the 4-wheel drive system does not engage
